mapper.select: SELECT FREE_NO, FREE_TITLE, MEM_NAME, FREE_DAY, FREE_HIT FROM FREE ORDER BY FREE_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM FREE ORDER BY FREE_DAY DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(FREE_NO)+1,1) AS FREE_NO FROM FREE
INSERT INTO FREE(FREE_NO, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CON, MEM_NAME, FREE_HIT, FREE_DAY, FREE_ORI_ROU, FREE_PHY_ROU, MEM_EMAIL) VALUES(#{free_no},#{free_title},#{free_con},#{mem_name},0,sysdate,#{free_ori_rou},#{free_phy_rou},#{mem_email})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FREE_COMM WHERE FREE_NO = #{free_no} ORDER BY FREE_COMM_NO
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(FREE_COMM_NO)+1,1) AS FREE_COMM_NO FROM FREE_COMM
INSERT INTO FREE_COMM(FREE_COMM_NO, MEM_NAME, MEM_EMAIL, FREE_COMM_CON, FREE_COMM_DAY, FREE_NO) VALUES(#{free_comm_no},#{mem_name},#{mem_email},#{free_comm_con},sysdate,#{free_no})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(FREE_COMM_NO) AS COMM_COUNT FROM FREE_COMM WHERE FREE_NO=#{free_no}
